text: Juan Pablo Colmenarejo Pérez (17 September 1967 - 23 February 2022) was a Spanish journalist. He was born in Madrid. His career began in 1995. He worked for Onda Cero, Cadena COPE and Onda Madrid. Colmenarejo died from problems caused by a cerebral infarction on 23 February 2022 in Madrid, aged 54.Muere Juan Pablo Colmenarejo a los 54 años de edad a causa de un infarto cerebral ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from cerebral infarction Category:Spanish journalists Category:Writers from Madrid
title: Juan Pablo Colmenarejo
